meanings.definition: Showing a casual and cheerful indifference
meanings.sent1: She had a blitheful attitude towards the rainy weather.
meanings.sent2: The children played outside in a blitheful manner.
meanings.sent3: Despite the traffic jam, he remained blitheful and sang along to the radio.
meanings.sent4: Her blitheful demeanor was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The blitheful laughter of the friends echoed through the park.

meanings.sent4: The blitheful melody of the song lifted their spirits instantly.
meanings.sent5: The blitheful picnic by the lake was a perfect escape from daily worries.
